summary: Frontend testing completed for Print Claim Form and Individual Indemnity Form Print features. Both P0 features are working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 404 - checklist templates endpoint not found (non-blocking)

critical_code_review_comments: ClaimFormPrint.jsx: Well-structured component with proper data loading, error handling, and print functionality
IndemnityFormPrint.jsx: Clean implementation with proper styling for print output
SessionCosting.jsx: Print Claim Form button properly integrated with data-testid attribute
AdminDashboard.jsx: Indemnity Records dialog properly shows Print button for each participant with data-testid attributes
seed_data_creation: Used existing session: (InHouse) Defensive Riding fastrack B2 One Day Programme (ID: e33855cf-7671-42f5-adb4-8f857490795e)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Print features tested successfully. Session exists in December 2025 - need to change month filter from default January 2026 to see sessions. Admin credentials: arjuna@mddrc.com.my / Dana102229

P0_Print_Claim_Form.description: Print Claim Form button in Session Costing modal opens ClaimFormPrint component with all session costing data including: company info, training dates, participants count, invoice details, trainers with fees, expenses breakdown, costing summary with profit calculation, and acknowledgment section

P0_Individual_Indemnity_Form_Print.description: Print button in Indemnity Records dialog opens IndemnityFormPrint for each participant showing: company name, session info, participant details (name, IC, phone, email), indemnity declaration text, acceptance status, and signature section

Session_Costing_Modal.description: Session Costing modal opens correctly when clicking Costing button on a session card

Indemnity_Records_Dialog.description: Indemnity Records dialog opens correctly showing all 27 participants with status, IC numbers, and individual Print buttons
